text:
<@UEKMY50SU> the first limitation that i have studied is that it can store only 10000 rows in a table due to which i decided to store my data in my own db because it may cause problem in future.

and the other one is that i have to use api's to store and retrive data which may also slow my app.
and with api's i can only retrieve data with respect to table id or table name or row id and row name . i cannot get values according to my own column name value.
have you considered Custom Objects for your use case?
